bio:
Nick is a mobile application software engineer at Starfinanz, specializing in Kotlin Multiplatform and boasting hands-on experience in native iOS development.
 In addition to his development skills, Nick has a background in DevOps, particularly in driving test automation using the Experitest platform, with a tech stack that includes Appium, GitLab, and Kubernetes and Docker.
title: Software Engineer
name: Nick Koops
